Instantly reach the people in your life

## General info

Simple, Reliable Messaging
Easy Chat is a simple way to message and caht with your friends and family for free.

## Technologies

Project is created with:

- react version: 16.8.6
- firebase version: 6.6.2
- styled-components version: 4.4.0
- react-router version5.1.2

## Setup

To run this project, install it locally using npm:

```
$ cd ../property
$ npm install
$ npm start
```
